app.name: NullGravity
app.description: AI Account Management & Protocol Proxy System

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your AI service status
dashboard.noAccountsHint: Add your first AI account to see quota status here.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.subtitle: Manage your AI service accounts
accounts.noAccountsDesc: Add your first AI account to get started.
accounts.addAccountDesc: Choose a method to add an AI service account
accounts.googleLoginDesc: Add account via Google OAuth authorization
accounts.authWaiting: Please complete Google authorization in your browser. This dialog will close automatically when done.
accounts.deviceFingerprintDesc: Unique device identifiers bound to this account for isolation
accounts.regenerateConfirm: This will generate new random fingerprints. The old ones cannot be recovered. Continue?
accounts.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone.

validation.title: Account Action Required
validation.message: Your account requires verification to correct an issue with Google services.
validation.note: Please verify your account to restore functionality.

accounts.exportDesc: {count} accounts — Copy JSON or save as file
accounts.importDesc: Import account credentials from a JSON file or clipboard
accounts.importPastePlaceholder: Paste JSON data here (supports simple refresh_token format or full credentials format)
accounts.importInvalidFormat: Invalid JSON format. Please check your data.
accounts.importPreviewDesc: About to import {count} accounts. Please confirm to proceed.
accounts.importingDesc: Importing accounts, please do not close this dialog...

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your NullGravity preferences
settings.generalDesc: Change theme and other general settings
settings.proxyPortDesc: Port for the API proxy server
settings.proxyUpstreamDesc: Configure a global network proxy. All backend requests (Google login, API calls, etc.) will be routed through it
settings.proxyUrlDesc: Enter the full URL of the upstream proxy server
settings.dataDirLongDesc: NullGravity stores configuration files, databases, and local caches here.
settings.aboutDesc: View app version, author, and source code
settings.author: Author
settings.cacheDataDesc: Logs, activity records, and avatar files
settings.clearCacheConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all cache? This will delete all logs and avatars.
settings.clearedDesc: All logs and cache files have been deleted.
settings.sidebarEffectDesc: Apply a translucent tinted effect to the sidebar
settings.autoRefreshDesc: Automatically refresh account tokens at intervals to keep them active
settings.antigravityDesc: Configure Antigravity path and launch arguments
settings.antigravityPathDesc: Specify the executable path if installed in a non-standard location (MacOS: point to .app).
settings.antigravityArgsDesc: Specify launch arguments for Antigravity, e.g., --user-data-dir. Can detect current args from a running process.
settings.antigravityArgsNotDetected: No Antigravity process found. Make sure Antigravity is running.
settings.antigravityArgsDefault: Antigravity is running with default arguments (no custom flags to capture).
settings.antigravityCacheDesc:
Ensure Antigravity is fully closed before clearing.

This operation will initialize Antigravity data.
settings.antigravityDetectFailDesc: Unable to find Antigravity installation automatically. Please select manually or check installation.

apiProxy.title: API Proxy
apiProxy.subtitle: CloudCode reverse proxy with automatic account rotation
apiProxy.portDesc: Local proxy port for Antigravity to connect to
apiProxy.poolDesc: Active Antigravity accounts available for token rotation
apiProxy.poolEmpty: No accounts — add Antigravity accounts first
apiProxy.usageStep1: Start the proxy on a local port (default 9090)
apiProxy.usageStep3: The proxy will automatically rotate tokens when quota is exhausted
apiProxy.antigravityProxyDesc: Transparent reverse proxy with token rotation
apiProxy.tokenManagementDesc: Manage API tokens for OpenAI-compatible access
apiProxy.noTokensDesc: Create a token to access the proxy via OpenAI-compatible API
apiProxy.tokenCreatedDesc: Make sure to copy the token — it won't be shown in full again
apiProxy.deleteTokenConfirm: Delete this token? Applications using it will lose access.
apiProxy.regenerateTokenConfirm: Regenerate this token? The old token will stop working immediately.
apiProxy.tokenUsageStep1: Set the API Base URL in your client (e.g. CherryStudio, Cursor):
apiProxy.tokenUsageStep2: Use the token above as the API Key
apiProxy.tokenUsageStep3: Supported models: gemini-2.5-pro, gemini-2.5-flash, gemini-2.0-flash, gemini-2.0-flash-lite
apiProxy.proxyLogsDesc: View proxy request history and details
apiProxy.noLogsDesc: Proxy requests will appear here when traffic flows through
apiProxy.modelDescGemini25Pro: Highest performance for complex, highly reasoning-intensive tasks
apiProxy.modelDescGemini25Flash: Fast and versatile multimodal model, ideal for general tasks
apiProxy.modelDescGemini25FlashThinking: Experimental model optimized for complex reasoning
apiProxy.mappingRulesDesc: Remap model IDs before forwarding to upstream
apiProxy.noMappingRulesDesc: Add rules to remap model IDs before forwarding
apiProxy.deleteRuleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this mapping rule?
apiProxy.wildcardHint: Use * as wildcard. Rules are matched by priority order.
apiProxy.scheduleCacheFirstDesc: Bind session to account, wait on rate limit (maximize Prompt Cache)
apiProxy.scheduleBalanceDesc: Bind session, hot-switch on rate limit (balance cache & availability)
apiProxy.requestCooldownDesc: Minimum interval between requests per account
